info.name: GeoJobs API Documentation
info.description: The GeoJobs API endpoints return information regarding cities, jobs, and apartments.

query.description: Specifies which set of instances to return.
Specifies how many instances will be returned. Default is 20 if a page number is specified.

request.description:
Retrieves information on all cities, including:

- Name
- State
- Average rating
- An image
- Population
- Saftey score (out of 5, 1 is the most dangerous, 5 is the safest)
- Budget score (out of 8, 8 is the most expensive, 1 is the least expensive) (based on the daily cost of living in that city)
- Link to the walkscore site for that city
- The city's police department twitter handle

response.name: Example All Cities Request

request.description:
Retrieves information about the city based on the given ID, including:

- Name
- State
- Average rating
- An image
- Population
- Saftey score (out of 5, 1 is the most dangerous, 5 is the safest)
- Budget score (out of 8, 8 is the most expensive, 1 is the least expensive) (based on the daily cost of living in that city)
- Link to the walkscore site for that city
- The city's police department twitter handle
- A list of tags that describe what the city is known for (such as 'nightlife' or 'museum')

query.description: Specifies which set of instances to return.
Specifies how many instances will be returned. Default is 20 if a page number is specified.

- Address

- Number of bathrooms

request.description:
Retrieves information about an apartment based on the given ID, including:

- Address
- Number of bedrooms
- Number of bathrooms
- Build year
- City
- Price per month
- The property type (i.e. "Apartment", "Single family home")
- Square footage
- A list of images of that apartment

response.name: Example Apartment Request

query.description: Specifies which set of instances to return.
Specifies how many instances will be returned. Default is 20 if a page number is specified.

request.description:
Retrieves information about all jobs, including:

- Job Category (IT Jobs, Teaching Jobs, etc.)
- Company
- Job listing creation date
- Job Description
- Job logo
- Latitude
- Longitude
- Salary range
- Job title
- Job listing url
    

Note: Latitude and longitude are not the exact job location, but are most likely the latitude and longitude of the county the job is in.

exec: pm.expect(jsonData.data.title).to.eql("Work from Home Teaching English Online, no experience necessary, earn ");

request.description:
StartFragment

Retrieves information about a jobs based on the given ID, including:

- Job Category (IT Jobs, Teaching Jobs, etc.)
- Company
- Job listing creation date
- Job Description
- Job logo
- Latitude
- Longitude
- Salary range
- Job title
- Job listing url
    

Note: Latitude and longitude are not the exact job location, but are most likely the latitude and longitude of the county the job is in.

EndFragment
